name: Mind Zero
description: Mind Zero is an action-packed dungeon-crawler RPG for the PlayStationVita system. Play as Kei, a high school student whose life turns upside down when he forms a contract with a MIND, a weapon/being with deadly powers. With the government and other forces trailing him and his friends, Kei will need to discover the secret behind MIND. Will these newfound powers help him or ultimately be his doom?
